---------------------------------------------------------------------
          Censor is configured with the following settings:
---------------------------------------------------------------------
general:
    output-format: text
    print-config-on-init: true
encoder:
    display-map-type: true
    display-pointer-symbol: true
    display-struct-name: true
    enable-json-escaping: false
    exclude-patterns:
        - \d
        - .+@.+
    mask-value: '[CENSORED]'
    use-json-tag-name: true
---------------------------------------------------------------------
